name: TrumpyJump
description:
A game made for the GameDevNetwork Gooseberry jam within 10 days.

You are trump, and people are climbing your wall! Show them who is boss! Shoot down money at them or bop their heads to knock them off!

Don't let them pass!

///// HOW TO PLAY: /////

Use the arrow keys to move left and right.

Space or X to jump!

When in air, Space or X to double jump, and shoot money. This will fill up your heat meter. If it fills up all the way, you have to wait while trump cools down before you can shoot again!

Hold jump to jump higher.

Knock as many people off as you can before you touch the ground to get a score multiplier!

///// CONTROLS (Default): /////

Arrow Keys

X / Space
